EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners Call Summary (1381245553.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners Call Summary (1381245553.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Sean, If you have any expenses related to your upcoming project, keep the receipts and you can enter them into your MBO account once it is active. So, in other words, you will be able to deduct these expenses with MBO but you won’t be able to enter them until the account is active. Please let me know if you have any questions.Thanks!Sara___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Sean C.G. Dodd [mailto:sean.c.g.dodd@outlook.com] Sent: Tuesday, October 08, 2013 8:54 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: MBO Partners Call Summary Hi Sara, Just one question; when could I start building expenses against this year? I’ll be starting paid in a couple of weeks, but would like to use the bench time to do some training and prep – can I expense books I buy now? Regards,Sean From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>] Sent: Monday, October 07, 2013 5:50 PM To: sean.c.g.dodd@outlook.com <mailto:sean.c.g.dodd@outlook.com> Subject: MBO Partners Call Summary Dear Sean, It was a pleasure speaking with you today. I’ve enclosed a few resources that you might find helpful: - Here is a short list of some of our top clients within MBO Access <http://link.mbopartners.com/ol/0xEFfZmddHNcoUZ1%5Fu%2DNb%5Fmgz3iQN8jlq65yDbq2lMIt3kF6L7yJPEjr1YIDT8Z0dufDUUQVGpQ80wlZFK6WMocO%5FvpZD2G9TS%5Fzj67RIY5BfPJm1cU8r%2D6gwHQXq4CvpnmfD2cgWUg%2DaA2tXbw4qgX%5FJKkUUxCGzUqYD7MCzhIsjug%2D8ru%5FUL6C916ppRT%5F9gDeGGZX6fiRx0iGAbRyooUntXguxlkJWc3vzwHE2pIdsSs4%2DLVjvSRB%5FP4gdcJS1TGdZym687bAZbhsT4Ork%5Funtv97PkY02LMnemSAB2q4V42tXgRo9TTZmjY2HDxfdBZJC8wMphSy7G9jT8FbbwHpxXRlgik%2C/1gwVMM7QNFhXs0g45v6WMqj%5FizvFaIvmuLNwRuX1ncI81gd3f%2D3IPVKgpfF%2DI7MxZuyNEj05HZZu0gFZDumacs5Q%5FvMCBkqmZy%5Fwi%5FyId7hvWo55%5F8BHzZGwz2xUutuUqnbdC18DWElcZlKEYqsMqm%5FVdcIFaxPUrE30Jp4KqQ8hhLEx0df4Wfbn3w%2C%2C>. - We have an index of recorded Webinars that will comprehensively cover everything to do with working independently. You can see them by going here. <http://link.mbopartners.com/ol/0xEFfZmddHNcoUZ1%5Fu%2DNb%5Fmgz3iQN8jlq65yDbq2lMIt3kF6L7yJPEjr1YIDT8Z0dufDUUQVGpQ80wlZFK6WMocO%5FvpZD2G9TS%5Fzj67RIY5BfPJm1cU8r%2D6gwHQXq4CvpnmfD2cgWUg%2DaA2tXbw4qgX%5FJKkUUxCGzUqYD7MCzhIsjug%2D8ru%5FUL6C916ppRT%5F9gDeGGZX6fiRx0iGAbRyooUntXguxlkJWc3vzwHE2pIdsSs4%2DLVjvSRB%5FP4gdcJS1TGdZym687bAZbhsT4Ork%5Funtv97PkY02LMnemSAB2q4V42tXgRo9TTZmjY2HDxfdBZJC8wMphSy7G9jT8FbbwHpxXRlgik%2C/1hAVNITFNB5OolA45v6WMqj%5FizvFaIvmuLNwRuXjwcAry0t7YaPONE2whdhFI4Y9brTMGTcxOKpr4w1%2DKNmAa4wR6vNLM2ujWivymJnqbdlXeqBf8pNTuvqD7HBW%5FOu3gUXlPGgnQX1ZY0POTfpzoA%2C%2C> - I have attached the net cash estimate we created on the phone, please give me a quick ring to review when you have a moment - Lastly, you can view all the information we spoke about over the phone by going here. <http://link.mbopartners.com/ol/0xEFfZmddHNcoUZ1%5Fu%2DNb%5Fmgz3iQN8jlq65yDbq2lMIt3kF6L7yJPEjr1YIDT8Z0dufDUUQVGpQ80wlZFK6WMocO%5FvpZD2G9TS%5Fzj67RIY5BfPJm1cU8r%2D6gwHQXq4CvpnmfD2cgWUg%2DaA2tXbw4qgX%5FJKkUUxCGzUqYD7MCzhIsjug%2D8ru%5FUL6C916ppRT%5F9gDeGGZX6fiRx0iGAbRyooUntXguxlkJWc3vzwHE2pIdsSs4%2DLVjvSRB%5FP4gdcJS1TGdZym687bAZbhsT4Ork%5Funtv97PkY02LMnemSAB2q4V42tXgRo9TTZmjY2HDxfdBZJC8wMphSy7G9jT8FbbwHpxXRlgik%2C/1gwVMM7QNFhXs0g45v6WMqj%5FizvFaIvmuLNwRvbixMYt1loze%2DLJNwz8xdBeEpY3K%2DGKDA5PHpt1%5FxhXEb3HZLVh0c9XKECUagLql62Lf4tYSZ5i3tFs55CV2jQcocmuvA7%2DTB0odGE%5FMjCoeqYJsRrOMZwWWEbU3j6SEQ%2C%2C> (Please bookmark this page.)
